topic: 17 Underrated Travel Destinations In The U.S.

ideas.title: NYC Tourist Relocation Program
ideas.premise: A frazzled NYC tourism board worker is pitching 'Underrated US Destinations' as part of a new 'Tourist Relocation Program' to escape the Times Square madness.
ideas.why_funny: Exploits the pain of Times Square and the desperation to alleviate crowds.

ideas.title: Statue of Liberty's Vacation
ideas.premise: The Statue of Liberty, overwhelmed by tourists, books a vacation to one of the 17 underrated destinations, leaving behind a cardboard cutout.
ideas.why_funny: Inverts expectation; even iconic landmarks need a break.

ideas.title: Broadway's 'Underrated: The Musical'
ideas.premise: A failing Broadway musical, desperately trying to stay open, rebrands as 'Underrated: The Musical,' showcasing song and dance numbers about obscure locales.
ideas.why_funny: Pokes fun at Broadway's desperation for hits and obscure travel.

ideas.title: Subway Map of Hidden Gems
ideas.premise: A New Yorker uses a subway map, not for the MTA, but to locate the 17 underrated US destinations, each stop a different state.
ideas.why_funny: Relatable subway frustration meets geographical confusion.

ideas.title: King Charles' Exiled Travel Agent
ideas.premise: A travel agent, fresh off banishing Andrew to Sandringham, tries to pitch King Charles on visiting the 17 underrated spots, met with royal disdain.
ideas.why_funny: Mixes royal drama with travel destinations and dry British humor.
